3a1(mtshan 'bum): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spobs pa'i brgyan
3a2(mtshan 'bum): bke pa'i dbyangs kyi nga re snun pa 'brug sgra sgregs pa sman chen po zhal gsal pa/ zla ba dri ma med pa'i dpal gyi snying
3a3(mtshan 'bum): po gzi brjid yid mthad gser sdug mdzes pa rnam par nges pa'i gzi brjid kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal le
3a4(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor ba 'jig la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa g+ha ser thab la phyag 'tshal le/ 
3b1(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srungs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs
3b2(mtshan 'bum): pa byams pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge la phyag 'tshal lo/ de bzhin gshegs pa rab gsal la
3b3(mtshan 'bum): phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs da pa thub pa la phyag 'tshal li/ de bzhinagashegs pa me tog la phyag 'tshal
3b4(mtshan 'bum): la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa me dog gnyis pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ de bzhin gshegs pa spyan
3b5(mtshan 'bum): legs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ded dpon la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa lag chen la
3b6(mtshan 'bum): phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa skabs chen la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rdzu ska rgyal po la phyag

10b1(mtshan 'bum): pa skyes bu byin la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje sde la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs phan chen byin la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gsheg pa zhi ba'i blo la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gabye pa
10b2(mtshan 'bum): spos kyi glang po la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gsheg pa sred med bu la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin ga sh+ye pa nges pa la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gsheg pa chug pa la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa nyi zla la

10b5(mtshan 'bum): 'gres la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gash+ye ba nyon mongs brel phyag 'tsho lo// de bzhin gabye ba 'ang pu la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa spos ldan le phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin ge sh+ye ba yul 'khor
10b6(mtshan 'bum): rangs la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gabye ba lha grag la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa srid thar gzig la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gabye pa zla ba la phyag 'tsha'o// de bzhin gsheg pa skra can la phyag 'tshalo de ban+d+ha

10b8(mtshan 'bum): tan rin chen la phyag 'tshale// de bzhin gshegs pa 'gro ba grags la phyag 'tsha'o// de bzhin gsheg pa pad ma'i dro la phyag 'tsha'o// de bzhin gshegs pa 'dzod spu ldan la phyig 'tshalo// de bzhin gabye pa grag pa la
10'a1(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje nor bu la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu bkod pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs
10'a2(mtshan 'bum): pa dbang chen la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan 'byung gnas la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po grags la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer bcu pa la
10'a3(mtshan 'bum): phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ma smad pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa glang po'i gros la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshes pa yid mthang la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs
10'a4(mtshan 'bum): pa rin chen zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rab gsal rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa kha lo sgyur
10'a5(mtshan 'bum): ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba'i dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug na rin po che la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa snyengs bral
10'a6(mtshan 'bum): la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen snying po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa zla zhal mthong ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med par grags pa
10'a7(mtshan 'bum): la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba'i gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba'i tog la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sgra gcan lha la phyag 'tshal
10'a8(mtshan 'bum): lo// de bzhin gshegs pa na chod bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa lha dga' la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen phung po la phyag 'tshal lo// de
10'b1(mtshan 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa mdzes par gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i phyogs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu mthor gshegs la phyag 'tshal lo/ 
10'b2(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs ma skye dbang po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa smra ba'i zla bu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs
10'b3(mtshan 'bum): pa rin chen gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa skal ldan shing rta la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu rgyal ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba
10'b4(mtshan 'bum): god pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa stegs mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa smos kyi glang po la phyog 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros 'od la phyag 'tshal
10'b5(mtshan 'bum): lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ri bo'i rgyal mtshal phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen pa spos bzangs la phyaga'atshal lo// de bzhini gshegs pa chos rten la phyag 'tsha/ 
10'b6(mtshan 'bum): lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid drag shul can la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi nor bu la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bzang po byin la phyag 'tshal lo// 
10'b7(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa bde gshegs zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs
10'b8(mtshan 'bum): pa chungs pa med dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa legs par skyes pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa thub pa med pa'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs
11a1(mtshan 'bum): pa grags pa'i gshes gnyen la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bden d+ha'i phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin ga shegs pa bka' thub chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshen
11a2(mtshan 'bum): pa rdul dang bral ba ldan pa'i 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rtsegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rdul dang bral ba grags pa mchod pa la phyag
11a3(mtshan 'bum): 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi grags pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sbyin pa'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa glog byin pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de
11a4(mtshan 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa bden par gsung ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'gon po mtsho byed la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa na chod bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo/ 
11a5(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa legs pa'i tshogs can la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par nges pa'i blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa srid mtha' nor bu'i spos la phyag
11a6(mtshan 'bum): 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba degs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal
11a7(mtshan 'bum): lo// de bzhin gshegs pa thab med pa grags pa mthog la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa thugs rab tu gzhungs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu zla ba la phyag
11a8(mtshan 'bum): 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa drag shul 'ad zer la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rtul zhugs thub med la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'ong dang ldan pa 'gro bas mchod pa/ 
11b1(mtshan 'bum): kha phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngag rten bla ma la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa kyang chen seng ge la phyag 'tshal lo// 
11b2(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sgra can spen pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan/ 
11b3(mtshan 'bum): rgya mtsho la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu zhi ba'i stabs la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten bzang po la phyag
11b4(mtshan 'bum): 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa shugs bcu pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dges la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin
11b5(mtshan 'bum): gshegs pa mthu dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mthu thob pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mthu chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan
11b6(mtshan 'bum): snying po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bden par spyod pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dge mchog rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho skar rgyal
11b7(mtshan 'bum): la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa klog gi 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgya chen la phyag 'tshal lo// 
11b8(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa dngal 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bdud dag 'dul bar mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal
12a1(mtshan 'bum): lo// de bzhin gshegs pa go cha dgos pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i phyag la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa me tog bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// 
12a2(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mthon po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sa 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa don
12a3(mtshan 'bum): gyi blo mnga' la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan gsags pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen me
12a4(mtshan 'bum): la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten 'das pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten zla ba de la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs
12a5(mtshan 'bum): snyan pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i tog la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa tshogs can rtse bo la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa seng
12a6(mtshan 'bum): ge'i bsgrubs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa drag shul can gyis byin pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa
12a7(mtshan 'bum): gzi brjid 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen grags pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa spyan gsal
12a8(mtshan 'bum): pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer don yod la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i drang srong la phyag
12b1(mtshan 'bum): 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa skye ba'i dbang po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dge 'dun brtan pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs bzangs la phyag 'tshal lo// 
12b2(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa me tog la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa yul 'khor me tog la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ches kyi blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa
12b3(mtshan 'bum): rlung gi shugs lngar gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa legs gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sdang ldan
12b4(mtshan 'bum): la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa lha tsheg la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan 'od srungs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa don gyi blo gros la phyag 'tshal
12b5(mtshan 'bum): lo// de bzhin gshegs pa skyel ba med la phyaga'atshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa grogs brtan la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od gnas mtshungs la phyag 'tshal
12b6(mtshan 'bum): lo// de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa thar pa'i gzi brjid lo phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa des bzangs la drug 'tshal lo// de
12b7(mtshan 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa blo bzangs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa blo mchog la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs par
12b8(mtshan 'bum): gnas la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bden par gsung la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa blo bzangs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa stobs byin la phyag
13a1(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i stobs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa me tog gi tog la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'byung gnas la phyag 'tshal lo
13a2(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa me tog byin la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa yon btan snying po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen grags pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa
13a3(mtshan 'bum): grags pa rmad du byung ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mi tshugs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa stengs med la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i 'od la phyag 'tshal/ 
13a4(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs par gshegs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes dges la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin
13a5(mtshan 'bum): gshegs pa lha bden la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bcings med la phyag 'tsho
13a6(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa brtul zhugs brtan la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i gzi bad+hin lnga phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs thub la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dam gyis
13a7(mtshan 'bum): bzhud la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa brtul zhugs dka' thub la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer phung po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid phung po la phyag 'tshal
13a8(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa bcas pa ka la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dga' mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa tshogs can bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po rgyal
13b1(mtshan 'bum): mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dges pa chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa me tog 'od 'dra phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa tshogs can 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// 
13b2(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa skrun par mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mngar 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa don legs la nges pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs
13b3(mtshan 'bum): pa khyu mchog la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa lag bzangs la phyag 'tshal lo// byed byazhin gshegs pa 'od zer chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bsam pas byin la phyag
13b4(mtshan 'bum): 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin
13b5(mtshan 'bum): gshegs pa 'byor ldan la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i stobs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i spyan la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin
13b6(mtshan 'bum): gshegs pa 'od bsrungs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa blo gas la lo/ phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid drug
13b7(mtshan 'bum): shul can la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// 
13b8(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid rnam par 'byes pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa khyengs med la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa spang gci'i zhas su phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs
14a1(mtshan 'bum): zla 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa klog 'byin la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu zhi bar gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrug
14a2(mtshan 'bum): ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom grags pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi yon tan la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa zhing bzang la phyag 'tshal lo// 
14a3(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa bkod pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par 'phags pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sbyin sreg 'od 'phro la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin
14a4(mtshan 'bum): gshegs pa pad ma'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bkod pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa shin du bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa
14a5(mtshan 'bum): rin chen mchog la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa thugs shin du bzhugs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag tu med pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa
14a6(mtshan 'bum): rgya mtshos byin la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i tog la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa zla gdugs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od 'phro ba la phyag 'tshal lo// 
14a7(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dri med rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes grags pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa kun du rgyal ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa
14a8(mtshan 'bum): yon tan 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sgra rnam par grags pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba rgyas pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma'i 'od
14b1(mtshan 'bum): zer la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa btul zhugs bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sgron ma'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa klo gi tog la phyag 'tshal
14b2(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa skar mkhan la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa grags bI grags pa rdzogs ldan la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin
14b3(mtshan 'bum): gshegs pa pad ma'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa spyan mdzes la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rnyog pa med pa'i don la
14b4(mtshan 'bum): phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa drag shul sde la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mthu rtsa lngal phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin
14b5(mtshan 'bum): gshegs pa thogs med blo la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sgra gcan lha la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes phung po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa kha los
14b6(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pardul dang bral ba la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyu skar rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams glang po la phyaga'ams
14b7(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa gcod par mdzad pa sa phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par grags pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gsheg pa
15a1(mtshan 'bum): chos kyi mdzod la phyag 'tsham po// de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros dbang po 'phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa yin tan dbang mtshungs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa de rjen
15a2(mtshan 'bum): sde la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab rtsegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa legs par gnas pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa blo sbyangs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ 
15a3(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mchog la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug sgra'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa
15a4(mtshan 'bum): mngon par shes pa'i tog la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshen/ pa tog la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'dren dge la phyag 'tsha'o// de bzhin gshegs pa skyes mchog la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin
15a5(mtshan 'bum): gshegs pa spyan sdug la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshes pa klus byin pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bden pa'i tog la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen brgyan pa la
15a6(mtshan 'bum): phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa zhum pa med dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs byin la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa
15a7(mtshan 'bum): snying po seng ge la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer sna tshogs pa phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes dpa' bo la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma'i phung po la phyag 'tsham/ 
15a8(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa me tog rgyas pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mthu brtsal stabs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams phung po pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa/ 
15b1(mtshan 'bum): byang chub rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sems can snying po mi zad pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par rtogs pa can la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa yan lag
15b2(mtshan 'bum): rgyas pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa yul 'khor shes rab la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mchog ma la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid tshim mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo// 
15b3(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab byin la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'jam dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chags med mdzod la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gtso bos byin
15b4(mtshan 'bum): pa phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gtso bo la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa muthu rtsal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od 'phro can la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sems
15b5(mtshan 'bum): can snying po can la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa snying / po'i dbang po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa shugs 'chang la phyaga'atshal mo// de bzhin gshegs pa snying po skur rgyas la phyag 'tsha'o// 
15b6(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa don bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa grags sbyin la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sems can snying po gzugs gzang po la phyag 'tsha 'o// de bzhin gsheg pa
15b7(mtshan 'bum): mtshungs pa med pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa don grub pa la phyag 'tshal mo// de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sems can snying po'i nor sna'i bum
15b8(mtshan 'bum): phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba la phyag 'tsham ma// de bzhin gshegs pa rgya chen la phyag 'tshal mo// de bzhin gshegs pa bsod napas 'od zer/ 
17a1(mtshan 'bum): sa phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa spang don la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa smon pa'i rgyal po sa phyag 'tsham ma
17a2(mtshan 'bum): di bzhin gshegs pa le shes thegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa lha mchog la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sa'i bdag po la phyag 'amab le// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam
17a3(mtshan 'bum): grol la nas la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug gi gser la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sgra can bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa thub dka' la phyag 'tshal
17a4(mtshan 'bum): lo// de bzhin gshegs pa thub gsal la phyag/ 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi dro la phyag 'tshal lo// de
17a5(mtshan 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa legs byin la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan dbang po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pachos kyi bdugs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs
17a6(mtshan 'bum): pa gsod nams lag la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chags med la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gya nom la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros zhib me phyag
17a7(mtshan 'bum): 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ga'i byi thams cad pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rtsi sman la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par grol ba'i tog la phyag 'tshal lo// /

17b1(mtshan 'bum): med grags la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bden pa'i phung po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs stan la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ri dbang mtshungs la phyag 'tshal lo// 
17b2(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa thar pa'i chos rtsegs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa thar pa'i gzi byin la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa legs mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ra
17b3(mtshan 'bum): tu zhi ba'i skul phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa yid du 'ong ba'i gsung la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa blo spungs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chu lnga la phyag 'tshal lo//

17b5(mtshan 'bum): skal pa bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin g.yo gas pa mi 'khrugs pa'i mdog la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa
17b6(mtshan 'bum): rtogs mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa spyan legs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa den la gnas pa'i blo mnga' la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba'i 'o/

17b8(mtshan 'bum): la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa khro ba bcom pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs mchod la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa legs gshegs la phyag 'tshal lo

22a4(mtshan 'bum): med pa'i rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub mchog grong la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa spyod pa gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa
22a5(mtshan 'bum): rin chen degs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshe gas pa chos kyi dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa lha thams cad la ba phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gshes gnyen
22a6(mtshan 'bum): bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu zhi ba'i stabs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi bdag po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po'i 'od la phyag 'tshal// 
22a7(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa 'phags pas sted la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa snang ldan la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid 'bar ba la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba
22a8(mtshan 'bum): gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa legs spyad rnam par smin pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa legs dges la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan dang bral
22b1(mtshan 'bum): la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs rin chen 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa spyod pa dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gsod nams stobs la phyag 'tshal lo// / de
22b2(mtshan 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgya mtsho la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rmad du byung ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa nga rgyal spong ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bdud drug
22b3(mtshan 'bum): par mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bag chags las rgal ba'i stabs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mi phyed pa'i blo mnga' ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho
22b4(mtshan 'bum): la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dga' bar mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa tshogs can grol ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba'i 'od la
22b5(mtshan 'bum): phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rin chen la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu gsil ba la phyag
22b6(mtshan 'bum): 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes dges pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rdzu 'phrul tog la phyag 'tshal lo// de
22b7(mtshan 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa skye dbang mtshungs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sa'i dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma degs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa
22b8(mtshan 'bum): sgra can zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa me tog 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sman pa'i bdag po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mdangs mnga' la phyag
23a1(mtshan 'bum): 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams dges pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba'i stobs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs dag
23a2(mtshan 'bum): snyan pa dag la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa spyod
23a3(mtshan 'bum): pa bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'khrug pa med pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa snyan par grags
23a4(mtshan 'bum): pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rtagaldan la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid rnam par grags pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'gro ba'i
23a5(mtshan 'bum): ba'i dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ljon pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gti mug rab zad la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dpag tu med pa la phyag
23a6(mtshan 'bum): 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa spobs pa mtha' yas tog la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rtul zhugs skur ba la phyag
23a7(mtshan 'bum): 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa po mchod pa'i gnas la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan rgal ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dge ba dges pa la phyag 'tshal lo/

23b1(mtshan 'bum): gshegs pa ud la pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dul gnas me tog la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa spobs pa mtha' yas 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin
23b2(mtshan 'bum): gshegs pa drang srong gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan brtson 'grus la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa snying po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs
23b3(mtshan 'bum): pa lha'i dbang po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mthon po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa skal ldan shing
23b4(mtshan 'bum): rta la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sbyin sreg 'od 'phro ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas gzi
23b5(mtshan 'bum): brjid phung po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i skabs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mi grayo ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rab gsal
23b6(mtshan 'bum): la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od spyod pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa klu dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor lo 'dzin pa la phyag
23b7(mtshan 'bum): 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dbyig gi mchog la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dag la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas grags pa la phyag 'tshal
23b8(mtshan 'bum): lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sprin gyi tog la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab 'gros la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa spos la bzangs la phyag 'tshal lo// de

24a2(mtshan 'bum): gshegs pa nor bu gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa nor bzangs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dge ba mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i

25b2(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa blo gnas la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rten pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa thar pa dges pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs/

26a6(mtshan 'bum): phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rlog pa med don la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa na grub blo la phyag 'tshal lo/ de

26b1(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa grags rtog la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan gsal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi sgron ma la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa/ 
26b2(mtshan 'bum): rab gsal dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa zhal sdug sde la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i stabs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa skye bo'i mchod
26b3(mtshan 'bum): rten la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho'i bre la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gdugs sde la phyag 'tshal lo// 
26b4(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa tsa la'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub dga' la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs
26b5(mtshan 'bum): pa dbang po zhi pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dkar spos la byug/ 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po'i 'od
26b6(mtshan 'bum): zer la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs po zhi ba'i zhal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs rnam lha la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings la phyag 'tshal lo
26b7(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa legs par sbyangs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas blo ngal phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin
26b8(mtshan 'bum): gshegs pa brtson 'grus tan la phyog 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa lta yis mchod la phyag 'argyal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa kun nas grol phyag 'tshas lo// nga bzhin gshegs pa 'ongs
27a1(mtshan 'bum): sa// phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mi'i gzi byin la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams stegs bzangs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa brtson rten la phyag/ 
27a2(mtshan 'bum): 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa thub pa grags la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa'i rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de
27a3(mtshan 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa kun nas gsal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid che la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom mchod 'os la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs/ 
27a4(mtshan 'bum): pa dpal gyi mchog la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa don grub sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dga' mchod la phyag 'tshang la lo// de bzhin gshegs
27a5(mtshan 'bum): pa kun tu sred la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub rab dang la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa nges
27a6(mtshan 'bum): 'byung blo la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ldan pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sna tshogs gsung ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug sgra la
27a7(mtshan 'bum): phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od chen phung po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dpal rtsegs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med la phyag 'tshal lo// de
27a8(mtshan 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa yul 'khor lha la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge dpa' ba'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mtha' yas la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs
27b1(mtshan 'bum): pa mthong na dga' la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sgren ma'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dpal gyi me tog la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs na
27b2(mtshan 'bum): grags la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa spyan sdug la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i me tog la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs pa med sbyin la phyag 'tshal lo// 
27b3(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa brgya skar rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba lha la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa
27b4(mtshan 'bum): che ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'jam dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ston par dges la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa klags bla la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin
27b5(mtshan 'bum): gshegs pa lnga'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs da pa dmar ser 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bde bar 'dud dal phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros
27b6(mtshan 'bum): sems la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dbyigs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa smin rab zhi la phyag 'tshal lo/ de bzhin gshegs pa rgyu skar rgyal po la phyag 'tshal
27b7(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa snyengs dang bral ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa blo gsal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa yid gnyis sel la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshes
27b8(mtshan 'bum): pa byams pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rtse mcheg la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sna tshogs gsung la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs la
28a1(mtshan 'bum): phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bdud zil gnon la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa shing rta chen po la phyag 'tshal la
28a2(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge stabs kyis gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer tshim pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu sbed la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin
28a3(mtshan 'bum): gshegs pa don grub rtsal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gzigs pa'i phung po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam
28a4(mtshan 'bum): grol blo la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs/ pa tshogs can la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu gsal la phyag/ 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan 'od la phyag
28a5(mtshan 'bum): 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i sgron me la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'byor ldan 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ston pa dges la phyag 'tshal lo// 
28a6(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa don gnas sems la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs/ 
28a7(mtshan 'bum): pa mnyam par gnas pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mthu rtsal chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mkhas mchog pad ma'i spyan la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs
28a8(mtshan 'bum): pa nyi ma'i 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gsal ba mtha' yas la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas gzugs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i bdag
28b1(mtshan 'bum): la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa yul 'khor kha lo sgyur la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa legs mthong la phyag 'tshal
28b2(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa mnyen bzhed la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa skal bzhed la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa nyi zhal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa thogs
28b3(mtshan 'bum): med spyan la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i bstobs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sgrol ma chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gzhon par mdzad la phyag
28b4(mtshan 'bum): 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan gas khang la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams snying po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin
28b5(mtshan 'bum): gshegs pa lha dga' la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa snyengs med dges la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs te pa shes rab rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin
28b6(mtshan 'bum): gshegs pa mdangs 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa zlas byin la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan dbyig la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas 'od la phyag/ 
28b7(mtshan 'bum): 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa nges pa po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs grags pa'i tog la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa snyengs med nga ro la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs
28b8(mtshan 'bum): pa kun tu yon tan la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'bar ba'i tog la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sred med bu la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen gsal la phyag
29a1(mtshan 'bum): 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu dgongs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa legs sems la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo
29a2(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid mtha' yas la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i phyag la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa blo snang la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i
29a3(mtshan 'bum): rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bden pa'i tog la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa legs ra gnas la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo/ 
29a4(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa 'phags pa'i me tog la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mchod sbyin chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa me tog chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin
29a5(mtshan 'bum): gshegs pa nyi ma'i 'odi la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gaphye pa rin chen 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs rma bya'i nga ro la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'byor 'di la phyag 'tshal// 
29a6(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa spyan mtha' yas la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa snyan par dgas la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bde gshegs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gsal
29a7(mtshan 'bum): ba'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas gshegs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa yul 'khor lha la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa blo zab la phyag 'tshal lo/ 
29a8(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa sde'i 'gros la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa zla bi 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid phung po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dge
29b1(mtshan 'bum): chung la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i mthu rtsal chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa brgyal sde la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa don grub gshegs la
29b2(mtshan 'bum): phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba sdug la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i nga ro la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ston pa gsal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin
29b3(mtshan 'bum): gshegs pa ye shes phung po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid me tog la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rdzu 'phrul 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa
29b4(mtshan 'bum): gzigs rjid mtha' yas la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs 'od zer mtha' yas la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dpal gyi snying po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs
29b5(mtshan 'bum): pa rnam par snang mdzad grags la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bden rtog la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid grag shul la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin
29b6(mtshan 'bum): gshegs pa nyi ma'i tog la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa bkod pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa drag shul byin pa
29b7(mtshan 'bum): kha phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mchog tu grags pa phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa don grub mthu rtsal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa lha yis mchod la phyag 'tshal lo/ 
29b8(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa bden pa po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa zil gyis mi gnon grags pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin
30a1(mtshan 'bum): gshegs pa smon chen la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa blo spyad la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mthun la can la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa thogs med gzigs/ 
30a2(mtshan 'bum): pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa yid gnyis spong ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rtul shugs che la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa lha gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin
30a3(mtshan 'bum): gshegs pa 'khrul med gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ de bzhin gshegs pa yul 'khor lha la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mdzes par dges la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa me tog dpa
30a4(mtshan 'bum): la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'jigs sbyin la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa lha dga' la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa thar pa'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin
30a5(mtshan 'bum): gshegs pa 'od 'phro la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan 'byung gnas la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa byas pa'i blo la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa byang
30a6(mtshan 'bum): chub 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub dgas la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa lnga dges la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin/ 
30a7(mtshan 'bum): gshegs pa blo zab mo la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbang phyug can la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gtso chen la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros sems
30a8(mtshan 'bum): la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dgongs pa 'khrul med la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams 'phags la phyag 'tsha
30b1(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu grags gsal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bkod de la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i 'od ldan la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i
30b2(mtshan 'bum): 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams dges la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge blo gros la phyag 'tshal
30b3(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sna tshogs gsung la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba
30b4(mtshan 'bum): sdug la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i/ gdugs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa gos pa med la phyag 'tshal lo// 
30b5(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa bzhud la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i zhal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa klu'i lnga la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa yon
30b6(mtshan 'bum): kan phral dag brtsu ba ste/ buzhin gshegs pa me tog sa cos ma la phyag 'tshal la/ de bzhin goshegs pa 'dag nan dgal 'a phrag 'ams lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ga brjid dpas mangs pa/ 
30b7(mtshan 'bum): 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bden pa'i tog la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa nyi 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi 'od zer can la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs
30b8(mtshan 'bum): pa ston par dges la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gsang bar dges la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dbyig gi 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams 'brung
31a1(mtshan 'bum): gnas la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa me tog dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan phyag ldan la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi sgron ma la
31a2(mtshan 'bum): phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dbyangs can la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bkod pa chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// de/ 
31a3(mtshan 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa thar pa'i nyi ma la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rtson 'grus rten la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa blo yi 'od ldan la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan grags
31a4(mtshan 'bum): pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa legs pa'i blo la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bkod pa dpag med la phyag na'atshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i mche ba
31a5(mtshan 'bum): la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nas mthu rtsal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa lha mchog la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs gnas la phyag
31a6(mtshan 'bum): 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs lha'i mchod rten la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa klog gi 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal bar dges la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs/ 
31a7(mtshan 'bum): pa lhun pa'i rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa me tog 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros mchog la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa spos kyi ngad ldan la phyag
31a8(mtshan 'bum): 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mthu rtsal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros khyad par la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa drang srong gsal la phyag 'tshal lo// de
31b1(mtshan 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa rin chen smon la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid 'bar ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gzigs tha ma la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dbyig la ge/ 
31b2(mtshan 'bum): phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bkod pa mdzes la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan dpal kyi snying po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gzigs pa gsal la phyag 'tshal
31b3(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa mdangs stobs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam dag sbyin la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes brtul bzhugs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa
31b4(mtshan 'bum): zhabs dag brtan pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'phags spyan la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i thar pa dgos pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs chen la phyag
31b5(mtshan 'bum): 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa yul 'khor mchog la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa spyad pa'i 'di la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sa ri la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin
31b6(mtshan 'bum): gshegs pa yon tan gsal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa snang mdzad grags la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba mchog la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa
31b7(mtshan 'bum): dgos par gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba lta bur gsung la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bla ma'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bas
31b8(mtshan 'bum): nams dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bsdu bar mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rims nang med
32a1(mtshan 'bum): phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'phags pa dul ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi lnga la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan bdud rtsi la phyag 'tshal
32a2(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa thogs pa med pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi phung po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bzla'i 'od ldan la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs
32a3(mtshan 'bum): pa 'brug sgra la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mi snyengs thob la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhi gshegs pa mkhas pa dges la phyag 'tshal
32a4(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa blo mi 'khrug la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'gro ba dga' la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i mchog la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa
32a5(mtshan 'bum): rdzu 'phrul mchog la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i bdugs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa klu'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mthu rtsal drag shul can la
32a6(mtshan 'bum): phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa srid pa'i mtha' gzigs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa brel yod bzang po la phyag

37a2(mtshan 'bum): pa chos kyi me tog la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid mdzes pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba'i
37a3(mtshan 'bum): 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu yon tan la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid rnam rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa lngas mchod
37a4(mtshan 'bum): la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'o// dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'khrul par sbyor badril phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus
37a5(mtshan 'bum): chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegasapa yid 'ong dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu dbyangs can la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa

37a8(mtshan 'bum): blo la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rlab 'jom la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab rdzogs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa tsher ma bkrug pa la phyag

37b2(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs mnyam dgongs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dgongs snyengs med pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsig sel ba la phyag 'tshal
37b3(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa bsam pa rgya chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bsal ba'i blo ldan la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sgrub med dgongs pa la phyag 'tshal lo//

37b8(mtshan 'bum): la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bdag med blo la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma stong la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa khur bor la phyag 'tshal lo// de
38a1(mtshan 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa gsal bar grags la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs su rnam grags la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dbang sgyur rgyal po la phyag
38a2(mtshan 'bum): 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas blo la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer yangs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bkod pa gsal ba la

42a1(mtshan 'bum): par byed pa'i 'od dang ldan pA la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan gyi rgyal po snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa pa rin chen srog shing la phyag 'tshalo//

42a5(mtshan 'bum): dpal 'od me tog pad ma bI dUr+ya'i 'od zer sku gzugs rin chen dri mchog la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dam pa 'di mchod pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin
42a6(mtshan 'bum): gshegs pa rtsug ter smin 'tshams mchog rgyan pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa nyi zla grangs med pa bzhin du snang ba smon lam gyis rab tu rgyan pa la phyag

42b1(mtshan 'bum): kha la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa thogs pa'i spyan mang po phyogs bcur 'od zer gyis khyab par mdzad cing 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du snang ba dpal gyi
42b2(mtshan 'bum): rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul phra mo snyed kyi skal pa chen po 'khor ba las mtshan tsam 'dzin pas ma lus par 'thor ba la phyag 'tshal
42b3(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa snying po'i 'od zer sgrogs pa'i dbyangs kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes ri bo chos kyi dbyings phyogs kun tu gsal bar 'bar
42b4(mtshan 'bum): ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ches brgya 'tshe 'di sgrogs pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan grags pa mi 'tshungs pa rna
42b5(mtshan 'bum): par thar pa'i 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// / de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi srin gyi grong khyer 'od mar me'irgyal po la phag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs/ 
42b6(mtshan 'bum): pa chos nam mkha' gyen du byung ba dpal gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'khor lo 'od dbang gi rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo// 
42b7(mtshan 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad dbyangs kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes ri bo rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ches
42b8(mtshan 'bum): sprin dbyangs rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes skar mda' snang ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos rgya 'tsho ston pa'i
43a1(mtshan 'bum): dbyangs kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'od zer ri bo dpal gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dbang dpal/ 
43a2(mtshan 'bum): snying gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ya shes rnag kun tu snang ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes seng ge dpal gyi rgyal po
43a3(mtshan 'bum): la phyag 'tshal lo // / de bzhin gshegs pa kun tra snang ba'i nyi ma'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad las byung ba'i nyi ma'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal/ 
43a4(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa ches kyi dbyings grong khyer/ ye shes mar me'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi tshul la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin
43a5(mtshan 'bum): gshegs pa chos thams cad rgya mtsho las byung ba myur ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs thams cad kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de
43a6(mtshan 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa grags chen chos kyi rgya mtsho shugs kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'od zer 'bar ba'i 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin
43a7(mtshan 'bum): gshegs pa 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rtse ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sprin bzhin sgrogs pa grags pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa
43a8(mtshan 'bum): kun tu snang ba mdzad pa dpal gyi snying po'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu rnam par snang ba'i dpal ri rab rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs
43b1(mtshan 'bum): pa nAm mkho' bzhin chags pa'i ye shes dpa' rgyal mtshan gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes chen po la rgyal ba'i 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ 
43b2(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer kun tu spro ba 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rgyan gyi gdugs dbyangs kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs
43b3(mtshan 'bum): pa dpal gyi snying po rtsegs pa rnam par grags pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa kleg gi mar me dpal gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin
43b4(mtshan 'bum): gshegs pa mun pa mtha' yas shin tu bral ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dge ba rab tu grags pa rter gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ 
43b5(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dam pa'i chos skyeng dpas gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi zhal mang khang sgrogs pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ 
43b6(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs thams cad kyi mar mo'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rin chen kun du 'bar ba'i dpal yon tan dpal gyi rgyal po la
43b7(mtshan 'bum): phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'dzam bu'i gser mdangs rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'khor mdangs 'bar ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal
43b8(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang dpal snying po'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen bzang dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ches
44a1(mtshan 'bum): kyi 'khor lo mdangs 'bar ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang ba'i dpal snying po'irgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// 
44a2(mtshan 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa dri me tog dri ma thams cad kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa me tog thams cad kyi dri'i dbang phyug 'tshal lo// de bzhin
44a3(mtshan 'bum): gshegs pa klu'i dbang phyug rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa zhi bya'i 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sprin steng dbyangs kyi rgyal po
44a4(mtshan 'bum): la phyag 'tshal lo// dri bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad sgrogs pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od zer ri bo dpal rgyal po
44a5(mtshan 'bum): la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang ba'i dpal kyi dbyangs kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi zla ba 'od kyi rgyal po la
44a6(mtshan 'bum): phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kun tu 'bar ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma gzi brjid dpal gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal
44a7(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan 'khor yug ri'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sems can kun tu snang ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs
44a8(mtshan 'bum): pa chos dbang rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sprin dpal rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sprin gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// 
44b1(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa mang po'i rgya mtsho la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs dung gser 'od 'bar ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gos pa gnod sbyin mchog 'byung
44b2(mtshan 'bum): po gdon gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od rgyan kiTer dbyangs dbang phyug rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa me tog gsal
44b3(mtshan 'bum): ba rnam par rol pa'i mngon par shes pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa me tog rgyas pa'i shing gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rab
44b4(mtshan 'bum): tu zhi bar 'bigs pa'i zla dbyangs dbang phyug rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa zhing gi rgyal po la
44b5(mtshan 'bum): phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa/ thog mar sems bskyed cing yid la byed pa rnam par sbags pa sa 'jigs shing sgeg par bral zhing gyen du 'byung
44b6(mtshan 'bum): de'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rjes su sgrog pa'i mun pa lus gyen du byung ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa shing n+ya kr-i
44b7(mtshan 'bum): ta'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dga' zhing mes pa'i rin chen snying po nor bu rtsegs pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa
44b8(mtshan 'bum): tshogs kyi dbang po'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bde 'ong rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// 
45a1(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab rtsegs pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs 'od sngon po'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma'i snying
45a2(mtshan 'bum): po 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan cha gyen du 'byung ba ri 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bla med 'dzum pa'i rgyal po la phyan/ 
45a3(mtshan 'bum): 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mchog tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin
45a4(mtshan 'bum): gshegs pa pad me mchog gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// / de bzhin gshegs pa mi tshugs mchog gi rgyal po la// phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab 'od
45a5(mtshan 'bum): kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab mar me'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sa'i dbang phyug rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo
45a6(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa rnga'i dbang phyug rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dpa' brtan bsde 'joms kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu
45a7(mtshan 'bum): 'od zer 'byin pa dpal rtsegs pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu brtan pa nor bu rtsegs pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs
45a8(mtshan 'bum): pa chos kyi chu rnam par dag pa nam mkha' rin chen gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa kun du 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ye
45b1(mtshan 'bum): shes skar mda' dbyangs kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i dpal gyi rgyal mtshan gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa pad mo shin
45b2(mtshan 'bum): tu brtan pa'i ri dbang rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mang po'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par spel ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal la
45b3(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs kyi dbang phyug rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin
45b4(mtshan 'bum): gshegs pa ri rab gyen du byung ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge rnam par rol skye pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs
45b5(mtshan 'bum): pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa zla 'od rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// 
45b6(mtshan 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha' dgon pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dri rtsang gser
45b7(mtshan 'bum): sprin bral rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rnga sgra dbyangs rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mchog srung ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// 
45b8(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa spos rtsegs rgyal po la phag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gdung mdzad pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dus mkhyen rgyal po
46a1(mtshan 'bum): la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs dbyangs rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs
46a2(mtshan 'bum): pa zla ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs
46a3(mtshan 'bum): pa rgyan gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ma'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs
46a4(mtshan 'bum): pa sman gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de/ bzhin gshegs pa khyab 'jug gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin/ gshegs pa sa la'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// 
46a5(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dri za'i rgyal po la phyag
46a6(mtshan 'bum): 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa shing gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan dpal gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma
46a7(mtshan 'bum): med par bzhed pa cing 'dzum pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs snyan pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa pad me dpal kyi snying
46a8(mtshan 'bum): po'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer gyi rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dri'i 'od zer snang ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin
46b1(mtshan 'bum): gshegs pa ri rab rtsegs pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu gnas pa'i ri dbang rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ri dbang smon lam
46b2(mtshan 'bum): gyergyan gsung rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho mchog 'dzin rnam par rol pa mngon par shes pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa/ 
46b3(mtshan 'bum): mun pa mi snang bas sgrogs pa'i leg 'joms pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu pad mo'i bdan la rnam par rol pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal le/ 
46b4(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dpal 'od mdangs kyi rgyal po la phag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen zla 'od sman kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin ga
46b5(mtshan 'bum): pa rin chen zla ba khyu mchog sman gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa skar ma'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa skur
46b6(mtshan 'bum): mchog gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ri dbang rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ri dbang rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin
46b7(mtshan 'bum): gshegs pa sa la'i dbang po'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa drug nas gyen du byung ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa pad mo'i rdug gnas
46b8(mtshan 'bum): byung ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa pad mo 'jigs pa las byung ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rtsen pa las byung ba'i rgyal po
47a1(mtshan 'bum): gsal ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab rgyal mtshan dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de/ 
47a2(mtshan 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa 'bar ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chu'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rlung gi shugs kyi dpal l-i phyag 'tshal lo// 
47a3(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa don thams cad kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od zer dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa'i dpal
47a4(mtshan 'bum): la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa/ rin chen bla med dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa drug/ gtor dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin ga
47a5(mtshan 'bum): pa dbyangs kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan mod pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs
47a6(mtshan 'bum): pa ri rab dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mdangs kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs/ 
47a7(mtshan 'bum): pa dge ba'i dpal lo phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa tshogs kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa me tog ku mu ta'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin
47a8(mtshan 'bum): gshegs pa bas mi khyab pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mchog tu bzang ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mthu'i dpal la phyag
47b1(mtshan 'bum): 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dpal chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// de de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes ud pa la'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen ud pa/ 
47b2(mtshan 'bum): la'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes bla ma'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gyen du byung ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa
47b3(mtshan 'bum): sems thog 'tsho mar bskyed cing phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo 'byung ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje mi bzad pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin
47b4(mtshan 'bum): gshegs pa yid gzhin dbyangs kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa kun du snang ba rdzu 'phrul chen po dra ba can rnam par snang ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin
47b5(mtshan 'bum): gshegs pa rin chen me tog dpal gyi dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu snang ba'i chos kyi/ dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs
47b6(mtshan 'bum): pa tshangs pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhon gshegs pa seng ge'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo// 
47b7(mtshan 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa pad mo dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bden pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo// 
47b8(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad ting nge 'dzin gyi 'od kyi dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu sgo rnam par snang ba'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo// 
48a1(mtshan 'bum): la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa yul mtha' yas pa las byung ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ 
48a2(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu brtan pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa me dog rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas me tog rgyal po
48a3(mtshan 'bum): la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha' rnam par dag pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par sgrogs pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// 
48a4(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par sgrogs pa stobs kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ka la bing ki/ rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs
48a5(mtshan 'bum): pa yon tan rgyal gyi 'od gsal rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen me tog yon tan rgya mtsho bI dur+ya gser gyi gser mdangs 'od gyi dpal la phyag 'tshal
48a6(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa tsan dan me tog mdangasau skar 'od gsal dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu snang ba g.yul rnam par bcom pa'i dpal la la phyag 'tshal lo// 
48a7(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs payon tan brgya mtsho sdang ba'i dkyil 'khom dpal yang phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pari dbang rgyal po la phyag
48a8(mtshan 'bum): 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi rnam par rol pa'i shugs kyi rgyal mtshan dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa me zhi dri gsal dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ 
48b1(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa sems can re ba'i gzugs kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan shin tu grags pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mi
48b2(mtshan 'bum): ldog 'khor lo ran chen gnas na zhugs pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i ngab kyid 'khor 'od las byung ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gsheg
48b3(mtshan 'bum): pa spyod pa grangs med pa la zhugs pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa tshad med mdangs bzang gser mchog dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs
48b4(mtshan 'bum): pa sgo dbyangs yan lag kun sgregs dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab dpal 'od zer dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mthu chen dka'
48b5(mtshan 'bum): thub ri rab dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos zab 'od kyi rgyal po dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha' mar me dges pa'i
48b6(mtshan 'bum): dpal lu phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma mar me dpal gyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin ga h+ye pa dri'i me sprin gyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de
48b7(mtshan 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa brgya mtsho snying po 'byung ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sprin dbyangs dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kun gzugs
48b8(mtshan 'bum): rAni sprin gyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa shing rgyal rnam par spel ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od zer ri'i dpal la phyag
49a1(mtshan 'bum): 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'od zer rgya mtsho'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa smon lam chen po shugs drag dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ 
49a2(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa snying rje chen po'i sprin dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dran pa dpal gyi rgyal po la dpal phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i dpal
49a3(mtshan 'bum): gyi rgyal mtshan rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ting nge 'dzin gyi mchog gi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ta la'i rgyal po gyen du byung ba'i dpa
49a4(mtshan 'bum): la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sangasargyas rin chen 'byung ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegasabye pa chos kyi nam mkha'i 'od kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal
49a5(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'od zer ri'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'od zer mdangs kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'khor
49a6(mtshan 'bum): lo zla ba 'byung ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyingasu gzugs rlan dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes bzang po bden pa'i dpal
49a7(mtshan 'bum): kha phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bI dUr+ya'i snying po mchog gi dpal la phyog 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par sdang mdzad 'od kyi dang lnga la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin
49a8(mtshan 'bum): gshegs pa bsod nams rab tu gsal ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo / de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha'i sprin gyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan nyid/ 
49b1(mtshan 'bum): mcheg gi dpal la phyag 'tshal ste// de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba'i rgyal po tha~Md dpal gyi dpas la phyag 'al lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho madrangs kyi dngus sna phyug 'al lo// 
49b2(mtshan 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi mar me dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha' gzugs kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu'i slong ba'i rgyal
49b3(mtshan 'bum): dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa grong khyer snang ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'o kyi rtog gi dngal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs
49b4(mtshan 'bum): pa rin chen rgyal po'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros ye shes dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan ri rab dpal la phyag 'tshalo// 
49b5(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan brgya mtsho'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu ri rab dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs po 'gro ba'i
49b6(mtshan 'bum): mar me dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa tshad med ri rab dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu sbyin pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin
49b7(mtshan 'bum): gshegs pa zla ba'i mchog gi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa zla bo dam pa dpal gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de pozhin gshegs pa pad mo mchog gi dpal la byas
49b8(mtshan 'bum): 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa pad mo snying po'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sa'i gzi brjid dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gyen du 'byung ba
50a1(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa gser nor bu ri bo'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi mda' rin chen bla re dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa
50a2(mtshan 'bum): 'od zer 'bar ba'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten 'od mchog dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings nga ro dbyangs la phyag
50a3(mtshan 'bum): 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gzhal med khang dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par rig pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam
50a4(mtshan 'bum): par rgyal ba'i dbyangs la phag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi'i dbangs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa grol ba'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal le
50a5(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par grol ba'i dbyings la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin go shegs po dus gsum 'od kyi dbyangs yon tan rin chen dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de
50a6(mtshan 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa rin chen me tog dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa pad mo mchog rnam par rol pa'i
50a7(mtshan 'bum): dpal la phyag 'tshal lde// de bzhin gshegs pa pad mo'i dpal la phag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ud pa la'i pad mo'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin
50a8(mtshan 'bum): gshegs pa rnam par thos pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas me dog rang bzhin dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dri rab tu
50b1(mtshan 'bum): snang ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen gyen du byung ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lod de bzhin gshegs pa pad me zla med dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// 
50b2(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs po rin chen me tog rang bzhin dpal la phag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa zlo bri'i gyen du byung ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes
50b3(mtshan 'bum): rang bzhin dpal la dpag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od kyi dkyil 'khor mdangs kyi rgyal po'i dpal lo phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dri'i rtse bo dpal l-i phyag 'jam
50b4(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes dben pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gzhal med rang bzhin dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rang bzhin dpal
50b5(mtshan 'bum): la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mtha' yas rang bzhin dpal le phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gats+tsha pa me tog rang bzhin dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// 
50b6(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen me tog dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dpral la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa pad mos mchod pa la phyag 'tshal
50b7(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha' nyid kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dam pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal/ 
50b8(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas pad me dpal lo phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dpol la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi za ba'i dpal la
51a1(mtshan 'bum): phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer kun tu 'byung ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa pad mo snang ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin
51a2(mtshan 'bum): gshegs pa bzang ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa pad mo mthor ba'i rang bzhin dpal la/ phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ngo bo nyid kyi dpal la phyag
51a3(mtshan 'bum): 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas rnam par snang ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bde ba'i ngo bo nyid kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin
51a4(mtshan 'bum): gshegs pa mtha' yas pa'i mchog gi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen nyid kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa nam
51a5(mtshan 'bum): mkha'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa zhi gnas dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa snyan pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa
51a6(mtshan 'bum): sgra dbang dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mos pa'i dbyangs l-i phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs
51a7(mtshan 'bum): pa yid bzhi ni dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo// de gshegs pa gsung gi yon lag dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rtsong ba'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin
51a8(mtshan 'bum): gshegs pa rnamo par dag po'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par sgrub pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa mchog gi dbyangs la/ 
51b1(mtshan 'bum): phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i nga re dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa zab pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bud med dbyangs
51b2(mtshan 'bum): la phag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu snang ba'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rgya cher dga' ba dri ma med pa'i 'od mtshangs pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo// 
51b3(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan nyid mi zad pa'i 'od zer kun tu sgo'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos mang shin tu 'byung bar sgrogs pa'i rgya mtsho'i dbyings la phyag
