51b4(mtshan 'bum): 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu sprul pa'i gzugs rnyan chos kyi 'khor lo'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sprul pa'i ye shes dkyil 'khor dbyangs la phag
51b5(mtshan 'bum): 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ches rgya mtsho sgrog pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu 'bod pa'i zhi ba'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin
51b6(mtshan 'bum): gshegs pa mi ldob pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'khor lo'i 'od kyi dbangs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba nyid
51b7(mtshan 'bum): kyi dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ma lus pa'i dbyings la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rnga dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan
51b8(mtshan 'bum): mtha' yas dbus med chos kyi dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa nga re snyan pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa phyir mi ldog pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo
52a1(mtshan 'bum): dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par grol ba'i chos kyi dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dri med 'bar ba rin chen 'od zer dpal la
52a2(mtshan 'bum): phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu spyan ras gzigs ye shes dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu yongs su dag pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ 
52a3(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje mthu chen dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs po snang ba'i rgyal po dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings dbyangs/ 
52a4(mtshan 'bum): kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal le// de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi me tog 'bar ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi mthu chen dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// 
52a5(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa mi chug pa'i stobs kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi bud mo rnam par snangaba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin
52a6(mtshan 'bum): gshegs pa zhi ba gnas dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bden pa'i dpal la phag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de
52a7(mtshan 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa dru ma med pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dpa' bo'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ 
52a8(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa 'ang 'phrogs pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa me tog dpal lo phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen dpal mor me'i dpal la
52b1(mtshan 'bum): phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu dpal rnam par snang ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chen po'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa
52b2(mtshan 'bum): rgya byin dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad dpal la phyag 'tshal khro// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin
52b3(mtshan 'bum): gshegs pa chos nyid dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa don thams cad yongs su dag pa'i yon tan dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mi mchog dbang po'i dpal
52b4(mtshan 'bum): la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs da pa tshad med bstobs kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu snang da pa 'bar ba'i dbang phyug dpal la phyag 'tshal// 
52b5(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa 'od med zla ba'i dprab la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbang phyug ye shes dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mi tshugs
52b6(mtshan 'bum): bstobs kun sdang ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mar ma kun tu spang ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po mchog rab blo gros dpa'
52b7(mtshan 'bum): kha phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu sprul pa'i chos dbyings dbyangs kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gash+ye
52b8(mtshan 'bum): pa rgya chen 'od dpal gyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'bar ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ches kyi rgyal po'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin
53a1(mtshan 'bum): gshegs pa 'od kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu ye shes yon tan dpal gyi rgyal mtshan
53a2(mtshan 'bum): kha phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa tshad med dpal tshul dpal gyi rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu ye shes rin chen 'od zer dpal yon tan dpal gyi rgyal
53a3(mtshan 'bum): mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu spags pa rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos skyabs dpa' ba'i rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin
53a4(mtshan 'bum): gshegs pa snying rje chen po'i sprin gyi rgyal mtshan// la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs bcur rgya cher sprin gyi rgyal mtshan la phag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs
53a5(mtshan 'bum): pa chos thams cad la rtson pa'i shugs kyi rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mar me rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan gyis mi
53a6(mtshan 'bum): tshugs dka' thub rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan 'od zer rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams mar me'i rgyal mtshan la phyag
53a7(mtshan 'bum): 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bde bar gshegs pa rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen zla ba'i rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshan lo// de bzhin gshegs pa
53a8(mtshan 'bum): bzang po'i dpal gyi rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dbang phyug yon dan rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa'i sgrags pa'i rgyal mtshan la
53b1(mtshan 'bum): phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu spyan yongasu rgyas pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen rtsegs pa'i rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal
53b2(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od zer ske'i rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa zad mi shes pa'i ches rgya mtsho rin chen rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa
53b3(mtshan 'bum): me tog rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa
53b4(mtshan 'bum): rdo rje rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa me'i
53b5(mtshan 'bum): rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gsheg/ bzhi pa'i rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'jam pa'i rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin ga
53b6(mtshan 'bum): pa dpag med rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa gzi brjid rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa nye bar gnas pa'i rgyal ma
53b7(mtshan 'bum): la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dpa' ba'i rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba'i rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po
53b8(mtshan 'bum): mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa che ba'i rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dpal gyi rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs
54a1(mtshan 'bum): rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer stong pa sku'i rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sgrags pa shin tu sgrogs pa'i rgyal mtshan
54a2(mtshan 'bum): la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rgya cher grags pa'i ye shes rgya mtsho rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa zab mo'i chos kyi rgya mtsho'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// 
54a3(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dkyil 'khor dpal gyi rtse mo 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa tshad med pa'i rin chen sprul pa'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa/ 
54a4(mtshan 'bum): spobs pa med pa'i ches nam mkha'i 'od la phyag 'tshal le// de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan nyid nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor// kun tu 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa tshang
54a5(mtshan 'bum): med sna mtsho'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin ga pa dri ma med par snang ba'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gtso pa 'ad bar yon tron drug tor ye shes 'od la phyag 'tshal lo
54a6(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya dri ma med pa'i chug ter shes rab 'a la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang po'i sku sdang ba'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin
54a7(mtshan 'bum): gshegs pa snang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings kyi seng ge sgyings pa'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa zhi pa'i sku'i 'od la/ 
54a8(mtshan 'bum): phyag 'tshal la// de bzhin gshegs pa dus gsum du spang ba'i 'ad la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sreng ge stengs pa'i 'od sa phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhi gshegs pa meshes
54b1(mtshan 'bum): 'od zer sprin gyi 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen me tog 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos sdebs 'di la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa
54b2(mtshan 'bum): dri ma med pa'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rang gi sku'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dra'i 'od
54b3(mtshan 'bum): la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chen po'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gser 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gangs kyi 'od la phyag 'tshal lo
54b4(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa me'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi'i dri'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de/ de bzhin gshegs pa grol ba'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin
54b5(mtshan 'bum): gshegs pa mchog gi 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhi gshegs pa kun du 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gtso
54b6(mtshan 'bum): pa chos kyi 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i 'dadi la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa me tog
54b7(mtshan 'bum): tsam pa ka'i dri ma med pa'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa brtan pa'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// 
54b8(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rtsang ma'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gsal ba'i 'od la phag 'tshal lo// de bzhin
55a1(mtshan 'bum): gshegs pa dra ba'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen zla ba'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'od la phag 'tshal le
55a2(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa rang byung 'ad la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa yin dag nyid kyi 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sprin las rgal ba la phag 'tshol lo// de
55a3(mtshan 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa sprin sgrogs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa spyan kun tu ston pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sprin gyi phreng ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de
55a4(mtshan 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa sprin rnam par mthong ba la/ phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sprin bsdig po la phyag 'tshal/ le// de bzhin gshegs pa na bza' sprin lta bu
55a5(mtshan 'bum): snams pa la phag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gash+ye pre sprin bstobs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sprin rnam par 'jig pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa spyan
55a6(mtshan 'bum): kyi dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa spyan basbyin la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sprin rnam par 'joms po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa/ 
55a7(mtshan 'bum): sprin gyi yan lag l-i phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sprin dang bral ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sprin bzhin grags pa l-i phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs
55a8(mtshan 'bum): pa sprin gyi gnas su 'jogs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan sprin la phag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa tsan dan sprin la bag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs
55b1(mtshan 'bum): pa kun tu yon tan sprin la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer zla ba sprin la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa ri bzhin sprin la phyag 'tshal lo// 
55b2(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'khor lo sprin la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad kyi zug mdzad 'od kyi dkyil 'khor sprin kyi la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin ga
55b3(mtshan 'bum): pa rdo rje sring po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ches kyi me tog rgyal mtshan sprin la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu rten pa skur mda' sprin la phyag 'tshal lo
55b4(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa 'od la 'bar ba'i sprin la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer zla ba mchog gi sprin la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rtse mo 'gro ba
55b5(mtshan 'bum): ba'i sprin la phyag 'tshal lo de bzhin ga/ pa chos kyi rtse mo rgyal mtshan sbyin la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu shes rab rnam par sgrogs bu'i sprin pa
55b6(mtshan 'bum): phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma mid pa'i ye shes dpal gyi sprin la phyog 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ri br-i sprin la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin ga
55b7(mtshan 'bum): bsnang ba'i dpal gyi sprin la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ches kyi pad mos rgyas pa'i dpal gyi sprin la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen pad mas
55b8(mtshan 'bum): rgyas pa'i dpal gyi sprin la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos rin chen me tog dpal gyi sprin la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rnam par grags
56a1(mtshan 'bum): gshegs pa'i dpal gyi sprin la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu sgras rgyan pa'i sprin la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gser 'od dri ma med pa'i nyi ma
56a2(mtshan 'bum): zer gyi sprin la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes nyi ma pad mo sprin la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bskyod nams sprin la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs
56a3(mtshan 'bum): ba rin chen dpal gyi rtse mo sprin mar me la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyabade bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgya mtsho dpal gyi mar me la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dpal gyi mar me la phyag 'tshal
56a4(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dkyil 'khor mar/ me la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu shes rab 'od chosanam mkha'i mar me la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gtso
56a5(mtshan 'bum): pa chos kyi dbyings na mkha' rgyal po'i rtse mo mer me la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa me tog spobs pa'i rgya mtsho mar me la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa
56a6(mtshan 'bum): chos kyi nyi mi sgron mar me la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer 'phro phyag rgya sgo mar me la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bzod pa'i dkyil 'khor mar me la phyag 'tshal/ 
56a7(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dkyil 'khor mar me la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen rtse me spro ba'i ri'i mar ma la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od zer
56a8(mtshan 'bum): ri bo'i mar me la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu 'byung ba'i mar me la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos dbyings mar me la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin
56b1(mtshan 'bum): gshegs pa shugs kyi rgyal mtshan mar me la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'khor lo sgrogs pa'i nam mkha'i sprin mar me la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa
56b2(mtshan 'bum): nyi zla mar me la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i mar me la phyag 'tshal le// de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i mar me la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa me'i mar
56b3(mtshan 'bum): me la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa na mkha' 'dra ba'i ye shes mar me la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od byed mar me la phyag 'tshal la lo// de bzhin gshegs
56b4(mtshan 'bum): pa kun tu snang ba'i mar me la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa che ba'i mar me la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs dpa klog gi mor me la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gash+ye
56b5(mtshan 'bum): pa mchog gi mar me la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes mar me la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba'i mar me lo phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gash+ya
56b6(mtshan 'bum): pa 'od zer me tog mar mo la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab mar me la phag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mar me la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gsheg
56b7(mtshan 'bum): pa 'jig rten mar me la phag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ches na mkha' mar me la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mar me nyid la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mchog
56b8(mtshan 'bum): ki mar me la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dri'i mar me la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sgrib pa med pa'i mar me la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ma sgribs/ 
57a1(mtshan 'bum): chos mar me la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu spyan gyis yongs su khyab pa'i mar me la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i dri ma med pa'i
57a2(mtshan 'bum): nam mkha' mar me la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen ri rab mor me la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs kun tu gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs
57a3(mtshan 'bum): pa kun gyi dpal me tog gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sa'i dpal lha phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sa'i dpal ri bo gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo// 
57a4(mtshan 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa bzang po'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs po rin chen 'od 'phro ra dpal gzi brjid del phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dpal gyi
57a5(mtshan 'bum): gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshes pa chos thams cad kyi gnas la gartson par 'byung ba'i gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ri bo gyen du 'byung
57a6(mtshan 'bum): ba'i rtse mo'i gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dus gsum mtshan nyid snang ba'i gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gzer gzangs na mkha' sgregs
57a7(mtshan 'bum): pa'i gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan grags pa'i gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi ri bo'i gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo// de
57a8(mtshan 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa rin chen ri bo'i mar me yon tan gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes nyi ma'i gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa che ba'i
57b1(mtshan 'bum): gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang po'i gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs
57b2(mtshan 'bum): pa mchog gi gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dam pa'i gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dam pa chos kyi gzi brjid kyi la phyag 'tshal lo// de
57b3(mtshan 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa 'bar ba'i gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa myur ba'i gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa
57b4(mtshan 'bum): rab tu dga' ba'i gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sa'i gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mche ba'i gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin na
57b5(mtshan 'bum): gzib pa mnyam pa med pa'i gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par grags pa'i gzi brjid/ la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu
57b6(mtshan 'bum): nges pa'i gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo// dri bzhin gshegs pa gzugs yongs sudag pa'i mtshan gyis rgyan pa'i gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i pad mo'i
57b7(mtshan 'bum): gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mchog rab dri med gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mnyam med bsod nams chen po'i gzi brjid la phyag
57b8(mtshan 'bum): 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rab byung mchog rab dam pa'i gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan nyid bsod nams sprin las byung ba'i gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal
58a1(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa klu bzhin gshegs pa zad mi shes pa bsod nams kyi gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mi tshugs pa gyen du byung ba'i gzi brjid la phag
58a2(mtshan 'bum): 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu bsod nams sprin dpal gyi gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dri 'od dpal gyi gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin go shegs
58a3(mtshan 'bum): pa byang chub kyi dkyil 'khor dpal gyi zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi skar mda' 'bar ba'i dpal gyi zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi rgyal po
58a4(mtshan 'bum): rnam par dag pa dpal gyi zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'khor lo rnam par dag pa dpal kyi// zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos
58a5(mtshan 'bum): tshul zab pa dpral gyi zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sku thams cad gzugs rnyan dpal gyi zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa tsan tan dpal gyi zla ba la phyag
58a6(mtshan 'bum): 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan pad mo'i dpal gyi zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi rnam par dag pa dpal gyi zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin ga
58a7(mtshan 'bum): pa chos kyi dbyings su yul gyi blo gros zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'gro ba kun gyi smon lam zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer spun gzugs rlan
58a8(mtshan 'bum): 'od kyi zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba'i zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sprul pa'i zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs
58b1(mtshan 'bum): pa mtshan gyis rnam par bkod pa'i rgyal mtshan zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu ban rnam par snang ba'i dra ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer spyan gus/ 
58b2(mtshan 'bum): baba'i zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mi chags blo gros zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par btsun pa'i zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs po mchod
58b3(mtshan 'bum): pa'i zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa des pa'i zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu nges pa'i zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par thar
58b4(mtshan 'bum): ba'i zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal po zla ba la
58b5(mtshan 'bum): phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba pa nyid la/ phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i zla ba la phyag 'tshalalo// de bzhin gshegs pa nug tor zla ba la phag 'tshal// 
58b6(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i sgo la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa pha rol phyin par 'gro ba'i zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa na mkha' snying dri ma medo pa'i ye
58b7(mtshan 'bum): zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rtag tu rnam par snang ba'i mchog rab zla ba la phag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mthu stobs thams cad dri ma med pa'i zla ba la phyag
58b8(mtshan 'bum): 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rtson 'grus mthu la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mo rdzi ba'i zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa spun rnams dgyes pa na mkha' 'i
59a1(mtshan 'bum): zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa me mtshan rab tu rgyas pa zil gyis gnon pa'i zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sku thams cad ye shes gzugs rnyan
59a2(mtshan 'bum): gyi zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ nyide bzhin gshegs pa smon lam yongasu rdzogs par sprul pa'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams mdzod kun tu snang ba'i 'od la phyag 'tshal
59a3(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgyal po'i 'od gsal ba lu phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa na mkha' 'od gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dri 'od gsal ba~M la phyag
59a4(mtshan 'bum): 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gzhal med/ teri bo'i 'od gsal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ri bo 'od gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa
59a5(mtshan 'bum): cadang ma 'od gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa yongs dag pa 'od gsal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu 'od gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin
59a6(mtshan 'bum): gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i 'od gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer gyi 'od gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa me'i 'od gsal ba la phyag 'tshal
59a7(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa nyi 'od gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa zla 'od gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dkyil 'khor 'od gsal ba la phyag 'tshal
59a8(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes dkyil 'khor 'od gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'dzam bu'i gser 'od gsal ba la phag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od gsal
59b1(mtshan 'bum): ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gser 'od gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma zil gyis gnon pa la kun tu 'od gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhi
59b2(mtshan 'bum): gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings 'od gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha'i dbyings 'od gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgya mtsho'i 'od gas
59b3(mtshan 'bum): kha la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad kyi tshul las 'bar ba'i gzi brjid 'od gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa nyi 'od gsal ba la gzi brjid kyis
59b4(mtshan 'bum): 'od gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sna tshogs kyi dpal gzi brjid 'od gsal ba la phyag 'tshal// de bzhin gshegs pa bI dur+ya 'bar ba'i 'od gsal
59b5(mtshan 'bum): ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dpal gyi snying po nor bu 'od gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gash+ye shAdz+ra pa gser mchog 'od gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo// 
59b6(mtshan 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs bcur rgyas par yon tan grags pa zad mi shes pa'i 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin
59b7(mtshan 'bum): gshegs pa rgya mtsho'i shugs yon tan grags pa'i dbang phyug 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa phyir mi ldog pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhi
59b8(mtshan 'bum): gshegs pa rnam par grol ba'i rtson 'grus nyi ma 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rtsol ba thams cad rnam par dag pas med pa'i 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin
60a1(mtshan 'bum): gshegs pa zla ba bzang po'i smon lam tshul 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gyen du byung ba'i 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa
60a2(mtshan 'bum): ye shes 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa yi ge stong pa'i 'od lnga phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bcu las 'da' ba'i 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs
60a3(mtshan 'bum): pa gzhal med 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i bden pa'i 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin
60a4(mtshan 'bum): gshegs pa zla ba'i 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba'i 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu spros pa'i 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo
60a5(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu dri'i 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa'i mtha' yas 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa stong las 'da' ba'i
60a6(mtshan 'bum): 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa lan mi ljon pa'i 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin
60a7(mtshan 'bum): gshegs pa gdon mi za ba'i 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu grol ba'i 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas me tog 'od zer la phyag
60a8(mtshan 'bum): 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dra ba'i 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sman chen 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mu med 'od zer la phyag
60b1(mtshan 'bum): 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer gyi sgo la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer nyi ma la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa me tog 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo/ 
60b2(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu mang po'i 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i 'od zer la phyag
60b3(mtshan 'bum): 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ches kyi 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dri rab tu 'phro ba'i 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings rnam par
60b4(mtshan 'bum): ston pa'i 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes chen po rnam par rgyas pa'i 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mtshan gyis rnam par rgyan pa'i ri rab
60b5(mtshan 'bum): la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kun/ tu bzung ba'i ri rab la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs/ pa kun gyi sgo mo bzang po'i ri rab la phyag 'tshal lo// de
60b6(mtshan 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa kun tu ye shes gsal ba'i ri rab la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang ba'i dpal ri rab la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi ma rim
60b7(mtshan 'bum): dpal ri rab la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dpal ri rab bzang la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dpal gyi ri rab la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan ri rab
60b8(mtshan 'bum): la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu ri rab la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab nyid la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin pa chen ri rab la phyag 'tshal lo/ 
61a1(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa ri rabo la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab chen po bzang ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan nyid ri rab la phyag 'tshal lo// de
61a2(mtshan 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams ri rab la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams chen po'i ri rab la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu mtho ba'i ri rab la phyag 'tshal// 
61a3(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa brjid pa'i ri rab la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen ri bo 'od zer ri rab lo phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mngon du 'phags pa'i r-i rab la phyag
61a4(mtshan 'bum): 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa na mkha'i ri ra la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rgya 'tshe'i ri rab la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dr-i'i ri rab la phyag 'tshalo// 
61a5(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dri mchog ri rab la phyag 'tshal// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par dag pa'i ri rab la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa lan mi ljon pa'i ri rab la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin
61a6(mtshan 'bum): gshegs pa dam pa'i ri rab la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i ri rab la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab lta bu la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rtse bo la
61a7(mtshan 'bum): phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan nyid dpal gyi ri bo la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi ri bo la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba'i 'od zab mo rtsegs
61a8(mtshan 'bum): pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi mthu rtsal rtsegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dpal rtsegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mthu dpal
61b1(mtshan 'bum): rtsegs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa spobs pa rdzogs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gser rin chen 'byung gnas gdugs rtsegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin
61b2(mtshan 'bum): gshegs pa ri bo rtsegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dri rtsegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dpa' bo rtsegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa cig
61b3(mtshan 'bum): pu brtsegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen me tog rtsegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa me tog rtsegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od
61b4(mtshan 'bum): rtsegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs dpa mtha' yas 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dpa' bo'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i 'od la phyag
61b5(mtshan 'bum): 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bzang po'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa kun pa'i 'od la phyag 'tshal kye lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mngon du 'phags pa'i 'od la
61b6(mtshan 'bum): phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu yangs pa'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mang po'i 'od la phyag 'tshal/ 
61b7(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rtsu gi dkyil 'khor 'di la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa
61b8(mtshan 'bum): yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'dzam bu'i gser gyi rgyal mtshan gser 'od
62a1(mtshan 'bum): la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dpal me tog gzi brjid 'ad la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi sgo kun tu gsung brtse mo'i 'di la phyag 'tshal lo// de
62a2(mtshan 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'od zer ri rab rtse me'i 'di la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i ye shes kyi rtse mo'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen thams
62a3(mtshan 'bum): cad kha dog sna tshogs nor bu gdugs kyi 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi rgya mtsho shin tu grags par grags pa'i blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa
62a4(mtshan 'bum): 'od dpal gyi rgyal po blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa zad mi shes pa'i blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo// de/ bzhin gshegs pa mi chags pa'i blo gros la phyag 'tshal
62a5(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa sprin 'tshams dpal snang ba'i blo gres la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs 'tshams su ye shes 'od dpal gyi blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin
62a6(mtshan 'bum): gshegs pa snang ba'i blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rjesu dpa'i blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu zhi ba'i blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin ga
62a7(mtshan 'bum): pa rgya 'tsho'i blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa tshad med dpal gyi rgyal po'i blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin ga
62a8(mtshan 'bum): pa rjesu 'dzin pa'i blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mi thogs pa'i blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mi man pa'i blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin
62b1(mtshan 'bum): gshegs pa lha'i blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje'i blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par sgom pa'i blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs
62b2(mtshan 'bum): pa pad ma'i dam pa'i blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par dag pa'i blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros nyid la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs
62b3(mtshan 'bum): ba bzang po blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi khams kun gyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po la phyag 'tsham
62b4(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbang phyug gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes dbang phyug rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dbang phyug nyid la
62b5(mtshan 'bum): phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dbang phyug/ chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mchog gi dbang phyag la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig
62b6(mtshan 'bum): rten dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa snying po dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs ming kun tu gzigs kyi dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// 
62b7(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan snying po'i dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos mngon du 'phags la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa blun med chos kyi dbang phyug la/ 
62b8(mtshan 'bum): phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mi'i dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dbang phyug la
63a1(mtshan 'bum): ba/ phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa tshogs kyi dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs kyi dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rgya cher sprul
63a2(mtshan 'bum): pa'i dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ ded bzhin gshegs pa zla 'od khams kyi dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa me'i dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros
63a3(mtshan 'bum): dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dri ma med pa'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa me tog snying po la phyag 'tshal lo// 6/ da bzhin gshegs pa shan ta mkhas
63a4(mtshan 'bum): pa la phag 'tshal la// de bzhin gshegs pa shan da lha 'tshams la phag 'tshal la// de bzhin gshegs pa shan ta mkhas ba la bag 'tshal la// de bzhin gshegs pa shan da bzang
63a5(mtshan 'bum): ba la phag 'tshal la// kye/ de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan pad me dpal gyi snying po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa pad me'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i snying
63a6(mtshan 'bum): po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa pad mo dpal gyi snying po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i dbang po la phyag
63a7(mtshan 'bum): 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i dpal gyi snying po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje'i snying rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu mtshar ba'i snying po la phyag
63a8(mtshan 'bum): 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dpal gyi me tog snying po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes lho phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'byung gnas gzugs bzang ba
63b1(mtshan 'bum): rlan snying po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gser 'od rab tu gsal ba'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od chad med par sprul pa'i gzugs rnyan snying po la phyag 'tshal
63b2(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rin chen gzi brjid dpal gyi snying po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa lnga dbang po nor bu'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dpal 'od sna
63b3(mtshan 'bum): tshogs ri rab snying po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i rgyal po dpal gyi snying po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen pad mo kun tu snang ba'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/ 
63b4(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang ba dpal gyi snying po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mtshan gyi rgyan pa'i ri rab la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od zer
63b5(mtshan 'bum): ri bo la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa/ rin chen 'byung la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen me la nga phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen me'i 'a
63b6(mtshan 'bum): lo la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen sdong po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'o/ zer la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin
63b7(mtshan 'bum): chen rdzog tor la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen phung po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mchog la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen nyid ri'o/ 
63b8(mtshan 'bum): kha phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen ri bo la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen yon tan rgyal mtshan gyi rgyan pa'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa
64a1(mtshan 'bum): rin chen grags la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung gnas la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen shin tu gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gtse
64a2(mtshan 'bum): pa rin chen skar mda' la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'od zer dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gash+ye
64a3(mtshan 'bum): pa yon tan dpal gyi brgya mtsho la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa khyad par blo gros brgya mtsho la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa snang byed yon tan rgya mtsho la phyag 'tshal lo// 
64a4(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa pha rol tu phyin pa kun la ma chags pa/ yon tan rgya mtsho la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dri 'od dga'/ ba'i stobs rgya mtsho la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin ga bye
64a5(mtshan 'bum): pargya mtsho 'byung ba'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos rgya mtsho lnga phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgya mtsho la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa
64a6(mtshan 'bum): dpal rgya mtsho la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho'i sgo la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos rgya mtsho la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dka' thub rgya mtsho la
64a7(mtshan 'bum): phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa garti mug ma bral bar smra ba'i blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa don dam par 'bar ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa shin/ 
64a8(mtshan 'bum): tu rnam par 'bar ba phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge rnam par 'phar ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rnam par 'phar ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin ga sh+ye
64b1(mtshan 'bum): pa ri rab rnam par 'phar ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa pad mo rnam par 'phar ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par 'bar ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin ga
64b2(mtshan 'bum): pa rin chen pad mo rnam par 'bar ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rol gnon la rnam par 'phar ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa stobs kyi sna la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin
64b3(mtshan 'bum): gshegs pa tshangs pa'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa mchog gi lha la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu mtho ba'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs
64b4(mtshan 'bum): pa drang srong lha la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bden pa'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dbang phyug la lnga la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po chen
64b5(mtshan 'bum): po'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa/ 'jug sel gyi lha la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rgya che ba'i// lha la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sprin
64b6(mtshan 'bum): gyi lha la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i dbang po la phyag 'tshal mo/ 
64b7(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa mu tshugs pa stobs kyi dbang po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa me'i dbang po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ 
64b8(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa 'od 'phro ba dbang po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa tshogs kyi dbang po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa tshogs chen po'i dbang po la phyag 'tshal lo// 
65a1(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa rjesu 'dzin pa'i dbang po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten thams cad kyi dbang po la
65a2(mtshan 'bum): phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i dbang po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen dbang po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba mngon par 'phags pa la phyag/ 
65a3(mtshan 'bum): 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rjod du med mngon tu 'phags pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sman lha la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sman mngon du 'phags pa la
65a4(mtshan 'bum): phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos mngon du 'phags pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa pad mo mngon du 'phags pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa las mngon du
65a5(mtshan 'bum): 'phags pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer yon tan rgya mtsho la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ye she/ dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa
65a6(mtshan 'bum): sman dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal mtshan dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bde ba dam pa la
65a7(mtshan 'bum): phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa klu dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chud dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dpal dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin
65a8(mtshan 'bum): gshegs pa 'dzam bu'i gser dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gsheg
65b1(mtshan 'bum): pa na mkha'i dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa pad mo dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dri dam pa la phyag
65b2(mtshan 'bum): 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu skyes pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin
65b3(mtshan 'bum): gshegs pa shin tu sgrol ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu skar ma la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu rnam par 'byed pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa
65b4(mtshan 'bum): shin tu rnam par snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin ga tso pa shin tu gnas pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dgol ba shin dra bcom pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs
65b5(mtshan 'bum): pa shin tu 'gro ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa shin du lha la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu mkhas pa pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa shin lha mchis
65b6(mtshan 'bum): la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu mkhas pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu bzang la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu yid bde ba la phyag 'tshalo
65b7(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu bde bar gnas pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu yongs su bde ba'i yon tan rin chen rab tu gnas pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa shin
65b8(mtshan 'bum): tu sems bde ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu tshangs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rdul med ting 'dzin rnam par 'phags pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs
66a1(mtshan 'bum): kun tu rin chen yon tan rnam par 'phags pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra med gom pa rnam par 'phags pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen chen
66a2(mtshan 'bum): dbyibs mang kun tu snang ba rnam par 'phar ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes mngon du 'phar ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes snyoms par mngon du 'phar ba
66a3(mtshan 'bum): la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid mngon du 'phar ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi rang bzhin mngon du 'phar ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa
66a4(mtshan 'bum): mtshungs med chos mchog chos dbyings mngon du 'phar ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams thams cad 'byin par mngon du 'bar ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa/ 
66a5(mtshan 'bum): spyod pa thams cad kyi 'od mngon du 'bar ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa legs kyi 'byung gnas la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi 'byung gnas la phyag 'tshal pa
66a6(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan 'byung gnas la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung gnas la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa pad mo'i 'byung gnas la phyag 'tsha'o// 
66a7(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i 'byung gnas la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa nas bkar ba thams cad kyi 'byung gnas la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams thams nad
66a8(mtshan 'bum): kyi 'byung gnas la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi 'byung gnas la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi yan lag me tog 'byung gnas la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin
66b1(mtshan 'bum): gshegs pa chos kyi 'byung gnas la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa kun du rdzi ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dang ba'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu nges pa'i
66b2(mtshan 'bum): sku la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer dkyil 'khor gyi sku la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen me tog shin tu rgyas pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa
66b3(mtshan 'bum): shin tu dges pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen pad mos rab tu rgyan pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi pad mos rab tu rgyas pa'i sku la phyag
66b4(mtshan 'bum): 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan gyis rnam par rgyan pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer gdon mi za bar rab tu rgyas pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gash+ye/ 
66b5(mtshan 'bum): pa chos kyi snang ba rab tu rgyas pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu 'phros pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i nga ro la phyag 'tshal lo// 
66b6(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa sprin gyi nga rong la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mthun pa'i nga ro la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa zab mo'i nga ro la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rje dbyangs
66b7(mtshan 'bum): nga ro la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sprin gyi pha ro la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha'i ro la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i nga ro la phyag 'tshal lo// 
66b8(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par dag pa'i nga ro la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad shin tu skyugs pa'i nga ro la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes mtha' yas
67a1(mtshan 'bum): dbyings kyi nga ro la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer phung po chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gzhal med phung po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa
67a2(mtshan 'bum): chos nor rtse mo'i phung po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rten pa'i 'od zer dra ba dbyings kyi phung po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa nye bar rtsegs pa'i phung po la phyag 'tshal lo// 
67a3(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa sa la'i dbang po'i phung po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa thub pa'i dbang po'i phung po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i phung po la phyag 'tshal lo// 
67a4(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa kun skyobs kyi phung po la phyag 'tshal lo de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i phung po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu dub pa'i phung po la phyag 'tshal lo// de
67a5(mtshan 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa za ma tog sbyin la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa smin mtshams sbyin la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gash+ye pa sbyin pa sbyin la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gash+ye
67a6(mtshan 'bum): pa shin du sbyin la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs mchog sbyin la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa sbyin la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba sbyin la phyag/ 
67a7(mtshan 'bum): 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rtod pa sbyin la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa klu sbyin la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dpal sbyin la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs
67a8(mtshan 'bum): pa rin chen mtha' yas la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i mtha' yas la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par rgyas pa mtha' yas la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin ga
67b1(mtshan 'bum): pa 'od mtha' yas la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bzang po mtha' yas la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa phyag mtha' ba dan mtha' yis la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs
67b2(mtshan 'bum): pa dpal dam pa mtha' yas pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dge ba mtha' yos la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gdugs mtha' yas pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin
67b3(mtshan 'bum): gshegs pa dbyangs mtha' yas la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha' sa med par rtsegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa blo rnam par rgyas pa la phyag 'tshalo// 
67b4(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa blo rnam par dag pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa blo dpag tu med pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa blo zla ba lta bu la phyag 'tshal lo// de
67b5(mtshan 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa blo nam mkha' lta bu la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa blo shin tu mi tshugs pa'i ye shes 'byung ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa stobs tshad med par 'byung
67b6(mtshan 'bum): ba'i blo seng ge'i gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mtshan gyis brgyan pa'i zla ba'i blo la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dkyil 'khor 'od gsal rtsug tor
67b7(mtshan 'bum): la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzugs rnyan 'od rtug tor la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas nam mkha' snang ba rtsug tor la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gtse
67b8(mtshan 'bum): pa 'ang snang chug nor la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dri'i 'od zer snang ba'i gtsug tor la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od 'gro mug dror la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin ga tso
68a1(mtshan 'bum): pa ye shes 'byung gnas la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i dbang po'i mug tor la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sna tshogs kyi rnag tor la phyag 'tshal lo// 
68a2(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu'i rdu ga tor la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs pa med par mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs par ston pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 
68a3(mtshan 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa shin du 'jigs pa la phyag 'tshal nga lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs pa tha mi dad pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mngon du 'phags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ 
68a4(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs pa la phyag 'tshal// de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs pa'i stobs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin
68a5(mtshan 'bum): gshegs pa 'jigs pa'i 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs pa'i dbying ngas la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par zil gyis gnon pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhi
68a6(mtshan 'bum): gshegs pa me tog zil gyis gnon pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid zil gyis gnon pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas dbyangs zil gyis gnon pa la
68a7(mtshan 'bum): phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mi mthong zil gyis gnon pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa snying po zil gyis gnon pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par
68a8(mtshan 'bum): shes pa'i ye shes zil gyis gnon pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po zhi ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa yid zhi ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa
68b1(mtshan 'bum): zhi ba nyid la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu zhi ba la phyag 'tshal lo// 
68b2(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa 'dul ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'dri ba dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mi thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa shin du thub pa la
68b3(mtshan 'bum): phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje'i bsam pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje gtsang ma la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje ye shes kyi ri bo la phyag 'tshal lo// 
68b4(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje nor bu la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje ri bo la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rab tu 'joms par mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin
68b5(mtshan 'bum): gshegs pa rdo rje lta bu la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje pad mo bla ma la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gash+ye
68b6(mtshan 'bum): pa zla ba'i bla ma la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa pad mo nyid kyi bla ma la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i bla ma la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa yan lag bla ma
68b7(mtshan 'bum): lha phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi rang bzhin bla ma la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje pad mo bla ma la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa'i bla ma la phyag/ 
68b8(mtshan 'bum): 'chab lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bla ma nyid la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pazhi 'od dpal gyi bla ma la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kun tu snang bar 'phags pa'i seng
69a1(mtshan 'bum): 5/ ge la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'jigs pa'i rdo rje mthu chen seng ge la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos na mkha'i gsal 'od kyi seng ge la phyag 'tshal
69a2(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho thams cad kyi snang ba'i seng ge la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi mar me 'bar ba'i seng ge la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs
69a3(mtshan 'bum): pa snying rje chen po'i seng ge la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge rnam par sgrogs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge sgra la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gabye
69a4(mtshan 'bum): pa seng ge stabs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa/ rnam par snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gash+ye dpa rgya mtsho rnam par snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo// de
69a5(mtshan 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa mtshan thams cad rnam par snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin na gshegs pa chos na mkha' dpal rnam par snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin ga
69a6(mtshan 'bum): pa gtsam snyems rnam par snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mang rnam par snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa spyan mi 'dzums khar snang mdzad la
69a7(mtshan 'bum): phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dpal 'byar pad mos rol pa shin tu rnam par snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu 'od gsal nam mkha' dbyangs rnam par
69a8(mtshan 'bum): snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i rgyud las rnam par 'phags pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bde bar bzhud pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin
69b1(mtshan 'bum): gshegs pa shin du zhi ba'i gzugs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa spyod par bzhud pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par bzhud pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 
69b2(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa pha rol tu bzhud pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mi chud bzhud pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de
69b3(mtshan 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa/ dpag tu med pa'i yon tan mang ba 'das pa'i brgyan lta bu la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen yon tan dpal brgyan gzi brjid phung po lta bu la phyag 'tshalo// 
69b4(mtshan 'bum): ngo bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer 'bar ba'i ro 'od dpal u phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba'i rgya 'tsho rgyan pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od brgyan zhon nu
69b5(mtshan 'bum): la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rgyan chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rnga ma la'i lo ma tsan dan dri la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dri thams cad
69b6(mtshan 'bum): 'bar ba'i sgrol phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu dril phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu dri ma yin pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu dri med pa
69b7(mtshan 'bum): drug 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dri zhal ku la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sgom pa'i dril phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mi rmugs dril phyag 'tshal lo// de
69b8(mtshan 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa dri'i bal glang la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu rnam par dag pa'i ye shes me tog la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos dbyings me tog la phyag/ 
70a1(mtshan 'bum): 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu 'bar ba'i me tog la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen me tog la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gtor ba'i
70a2(mtshan 'bum): me tog la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu me tog la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa me tog nyid la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa me tog phung po la phyag 'tshal lo// 
70a3(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par rgyan pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bkar ba'i yan lag la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba'i yan lag la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin
70a4(mtshan 'bum): gshegs pa mi smon pa'i yan lag la phyag/ 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sprul pa'i yan lag la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa yan lag nyid la phyag 'tshal lo// 
70a5(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa rdo par phye ba'i yan lag la phyug/ 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mdzes pa'i mtshan gyis rgyan pa'i yan lag la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa don thos ca
70a6(mtshan 'bum): gzigs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa don gzigs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sgrib pa med par gzigs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa don gcig
70a7(mtshan 'bum): tu gzi gas pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi za bar gzigs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa don gcig tu gzigs pa la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa
70a8(mtshan 'bum): bden pa gzigs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos gzigs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs med la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gang du yang
70b1(mtshan 'bum): mi 'jigs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'jigs pa med par mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs bral la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig pa
70b2(mtshan 'bum): rno par spangs pa la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs pa thas cad rnam par bsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mang du ldan pa la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa phun su
70b3(mtshan 'bum): ldan pa la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa pun su nyid la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa phun sum 'byung ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa phun suM rnaM par 'byung ba la phyag 'tshalo// 
70b4(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa snang bar gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa phun sum spangs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshe gas pa yon tan thas cad 'byung ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de/ 
70b5(mtshan 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa rab tu 'phro ba'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu sbyangs pa'i gnas la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa na mkha'i gnas la phyag
70b6(mtshan 'bum): 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sprul pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa shin du sprul pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa lte bu mchog la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa
70b7(mtshan 'bum): rab tu zhi ba'i dri mchog gi lte ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dus gsum chub la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa nye bar zhi ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa yid kyi rtse
70b8(mtshan 'bum): mo la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa yid mchog la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa na mkha' sems la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa yid du 'ong bar gsung ba la phyag
71a1(mtshan 'bum): 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor ba'i gsung la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gsung stan pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa brjid pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 
71a2(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa shin du brjid pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ston pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu ston pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu
71a3(mtshan 'bum): mchod pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i lhas mchod pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dpa' rten sde 'joms dgra spangs pa la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs
71a4(mtshan 'bum): pa 'od spangs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gats+tsha pa ji bzhin pa rjesu ston pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa/ yid du 'ong ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa
71a5(mtshan 'bum): bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa smon pa med pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad 'byung ba gsung ba la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od
71a6(mtshan 'bum): gsung ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra thul pa la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa thog ma seMs bskyed pa'i gcod pa nyon mongs pa spong ba la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa
71a7(mtshan 'bum): yi dam sgegs pa the tso bcod pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bde chen thob pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pas mchod la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma
71a8(mtshan 'bum): la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rdul med la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa tshangasu mya ngan 'das pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gabye pa rdul dang bral ba la phyag 'tshalo// 
71b1(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu nyams pal phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ke'u din+ya la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrug
71b2(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa skrag pa'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa byin gyis rlob la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu mtshan smos la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin ga
71b3(mtshan 'bum): pa mdzes pa'i rigs can la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa thugs chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rtag tu nan tan mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa
71b4(mtshan 'bum): byams pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs da pa zla 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa me tog mang+ga ri gsung la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chu 'dzin sgra 'byin dbyangs
71b5(mtshan 'bum): sman skar ma'i rgyal po me tog mngon par mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa the tsom rnam par 'byed/ pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gcig tu
71b6(mtshan 'bum): ma nges pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs partse mo ldan la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi dra bas rmi rgyan pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa so sor
71b7(mtshan 'bum): dmigs pas rgyan pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bkar ba nyid la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu snang ba 'gyed pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa tsan
71b8(mtshan 'bum): dan la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rgyas pa phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa gsung ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa thos par mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo// 
72a1(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa rnaM par gzigs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bdud 'tsho ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sten pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshes
72a2(mtshan 'bum): pa seMs can nam mkha'i sems gzugs rnyan gyi gzugs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mi tshugs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dpa' ba can la phyag 'tshal lo// 
72a3(mtshan 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa gdul bka' la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra med la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'du shes can la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'od
72a4(mtshan 'bum): zer 'bar ba'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin ga sh+ye pa dper stag lta bu la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa tshe 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs/ 'gro rnams dga' ba la phyag
72a5(mtshan 'bum): 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba can la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bskyed pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa spyan bzang ba la phyag 'tsha lo/ 
72a6(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa zla 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par bskyed pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par sbyong ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs
72a7(mtshan 'bum): pa rnam pa du mar mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mthor gshegs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu thal phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'am
72a8(mtshan 'bum): sbyar ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes sgo dbyangs la mchod mang po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kun tu mi nur ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhi
72b1(mtshan 'bum): gshegs pa rin chen pa 'dra ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'gog par gzhol ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu rdzogs pa'i zhal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin
72b2(mtshan 'bum): gshegs pa gzhal gyis rmugs pa'i ye shes gnas la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa tso bo la phyag 'jal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bsam gyis mi khyad pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 
72b3(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa me dge phe ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ni par brjid pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par brgyan pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gsheg
72b4(mtshan 'bum): pa spyod pa thas cad spyong la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin/ gshegs pa bal kyang rnal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa klang la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa nam
72b5(mtshan 'bum): mkha' mdzod la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu gdul bka' ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa tsan dan rtse mo la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dri
72b6(mtshan 'bum): ma byung ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos dgongs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi spyan bden pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par 'ad
72b7(mtshan 'bum): pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i gzis brgyan pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rtsol ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sems rtse gcig tu thub pa la
72b8(mtshan 'bum): phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bden par gsung ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bden par gnas pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bdud sde rab tu 'joms
73a1(mtshan 'bum): pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ma rig rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu brjid pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs bcur grags
73a2(mtshan 'bum): pa'i go cha la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa da ma la'i lo ma la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas par rnam par sprul pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan
73a3(mtshan 'bum): ma med pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bal glang sgyings 'gros bzhin la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal mtshan dges la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa blo gres
73a4(mtshan 'bum): thogs med la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gsung rab tu chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mun pa bsal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor
73a5(mtshan 'bum): skyong la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'phags skyes po la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa dges pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin
73a6(mtshan 'bum): gshegs pa chu bo 'jam bu gser la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa tso bol phyag 'tshal// de bzhin gshegs pa ung ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa nu song la phyag 'tshal lo/ 
73a7(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa rtsa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rlos phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rnal 'byor gyi bdag nyid la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa drab med
73a8(mtshan 'bum): pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu brjid pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa nye bar zhi ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa pad mo rgya chen la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin
73b1(mtshan 'bum): gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa' 'dul ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs po myug na rin chen la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa so sor dmigs pa'i rgyan sems la phyag 'tshalo// 
73b2(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge rlang pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'byor la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bde bar basbyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bdud
73b3(mtshan 'bum): rtsi la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i gnas la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs nis sbags pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi za ba'i
73b4(mtshan 'bum): gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bdud sde'i sgra rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs
73b5(mtshan 'bum): pa dges pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'bar ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor daM pa can la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa dkyil 'khor de
73b6(mtshan 'bum): pa rnaMs rab tu sgrol ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma 'byung ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi rang bzhin nges pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa
73b7(mtshan 'bum): spobs pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen ma la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa spyan chen po la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings kyi gzug
73b8(mtshan 'bum): brnyan la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs thams cad du mar me 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa snying po gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gtse
74a1(mtshan 'bum): pa dka' thub rgya mtsho la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa brjid pa'i dkyil 'khor mar me la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'khor lo la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin
74a2(mtshan 'bum): gshegs pa dri ma med par grags pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos rgya mtsho shugs rdul med la phyag 'tsha lo// de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i 'od mchog 'od gsal dpal gzi brjod
74a3(mtshan 'bum): snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid chen po rnam pa du ma'i rgyal po dpal 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa skal pa bye ba grangs med par bsags pa'i sang
74a4(mtshan 'bum): rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa tshul thos cad rnaM par sprul pa'i gzi brjid 'od gsal la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa ge sar bzangs mkha' sgra mang gan
74a5(mtshan 'bum): brjid 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen ri rab la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gsherdzogs pa yon tan rgya mtsho la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa
74a6(mtshan 'bum): kyi dbyings dbyangs dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos rgya mtsho sbra 'byin la phyag 'tsha'o// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa
74a7(mtshan 'bum): brji sa phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pos stobs 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas rnam kha' la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'od zer ni
74a8(mtshan 'bum): rab rtse mo snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa srin gyon mo la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma ma rin mo la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa zhing du sangs
74b1(mtshan 'bum): rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa shing gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan ri rab la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen la phyag 'tshal lo// 
74b2(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mang po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos rgya mtsho la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs
74b3(mtshan 'bum): pa gzi brjid dbu la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten mgon po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid dpal bzang la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kun 'od
74b4(mtshan 'bum): rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rin chen snang la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mi tshugs stobs 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ches
74b5(mtshan 'bum): dbyings gzugs rnyan la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs kun mar me 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhi gshegs pa snying rje'i gzi brjid pal phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin
74b6(mtshan 'bum): gshegs pa dka' thub rgya mtsho la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bzod pa'i dkyil 'khor mar me la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dkyilo 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin ga
74b7(mtshan 'bum): pa kun tu snang ba'i rgya mtsho mang la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa zhi 'od rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa rnam par rgyas pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa
74b8(mtshan 'bum): chos rgya mtsho shugs kyi rtse mo rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos dbang po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan sprin la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dang
75a1(mtshan 'bum): kha phyag 'tshal lo// dri bzhin gshegs pa lha'i bcod pan la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gang gnyis dbang po
75a2(mtshan 'bum): la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa na mkha' sba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu 'byung ba'i mar me la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa smin 'tshams dpal sdang la phyag
75a3(mtshan 'bum): 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pazhi ba grags par mdzad pa la phyag 'ana'o// de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho dngal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs panyi ma'i gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo/ 
75a4(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gtse pa mtshan nyid ri rab la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gsheg pa sbyin sgra dbyangs la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos
75a5(mtshan 'bum): dbang rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams ra~M ba~M la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gsung ba'i
75a6(mtshan 'bum): la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa me tog bza' ba bzhin dgongs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho snying po
75a7(mtshan 'bum): la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rig pa'i dpal le phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i dbang po mug tor nor bu snying po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi
75a8(mtshan 'bum): ri bo la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen phung po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa nor gyi dpal la phyag
75b1(mtshan 'bum): 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba'i mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gnas dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin
75b2(mtshan 'bum): gshegs pa zhi pa'i mar mo lde phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa snang mdzad 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa spyan gzhol ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs
75b3(mtshan 'bum): panyi mra'i gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi mar me dpal ri rab la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs
75b4(mtshan 'bum): pa lha'i dpal gyi snying po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge sgrags glog gi mar me la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu yon tan mang ba'i sprin la phyag 'tshal lo/ 
75b5(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa na mkha'i seM sa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu rigs pa mang po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa rgya mtsho dbyangs la
75b6(mtshan 'bum): phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos dbyings nga rol phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gsal ba'i sprin la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa lnga sgra dpal la phyag 'tshal
75b7(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs kun tu gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi rgya mtsho la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba'i gsung la phyag 'tshal lo// de
75b8(mtshan 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgya mtsho la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dpal gyi mar me la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i nyi ma la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gabye
76a1(mtshan 'bum): pa sprin rnam par mang ba'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen dpal mar me'i yon tan gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dka' thub grub la phyag 'tshal lo// 
76a2(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa zla 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rgya sang sa su bya skye po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ga yong du myong ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa me tog
76a3(mtshan 'bum): dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sa 'dzin rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gcig tu mang ba la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa naM par 'bar bas shin tu rnam par 'dar
76a4(mtshan 'bum): ba'i khyu mchog rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gabye pa ri rab phung po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bde ba'i don la// phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa rtse mo mang la phyag
76a5(mtshan 'bum): 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa tshungs mchog la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa na mkha' mthu la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa'i stobs kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tsha'
76a6(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa 'od kyi tu 'gyed pa la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa las 'byung yon tan la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna mang tshogs kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// 
76a7(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa spu dang ba dang bral ba la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa ye shre dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa tsan dan dri la phyag 'tsha lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu gsal ba'i
76a8(mtshan 'bum): spyan la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa dri'i bal blang la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor ba 'dren la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab phung po la phyag 'tshal lo// 
76b1(mtshan 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa gdugs gcig la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mi tshugs pa'i 'khor lo lnga phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa tsan tan dril phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin no/ 
76b2(mtshan 'bum): pa kun skyobs phung po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dra ba'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ud pa la dpar po'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs
